reviewText: Not as expected. When my husband had a stroke & was bedfast 2 years---I attended classes at the hospital on how to care for him.  I now have trouble with balance. Thought this disc was meant to help people with balance problems.  It is just a bunch of exercises to do. Was hoping this would help me to take a possible fall correctly---to help minimize hurting myself---or to help one to NOT fall. Very disappointed
This is a very helpful DVD. There is a great deal of very helpful information contained on this DVD and Shana explains it all so well.

This video is well-presented and FILLED with helpful information. Yes, it's vital for seniors, but I think ANYONE can benefit from the skills in this DVD. This is a no-brainer investment for anyone who wants to stay active. Shana is engaging and easy to follow. As a wellness professional interested in helping people achieve and maintain mobility, I appreciate that Shana has shared her expertise to produce this video & teach these skills. Jayah Faye Paley, Creator of Training on how to use POLES for Hiking, Trekking & Walking as well as using poles to achieve, maintain & regain mobility: POLES for Balance & Mobility
